job_tasks.phrase: You will be someone who loves to code and build working systems.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the core activity of software engineering, which is building functional systems.

job_tasks.phrase: You are used to working in a fast-paced start-up environment.
job_tasks.justification: While describing the environment, it implies the need for agile development practices common in software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: You will have experience with the software development life cycle, from ideation through implementation, to testing and release.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions the standard software development lifecycle, a core software engineering concept.

job_tasks.phrase: help develop our foundational model for video generation based on large video data-sets.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the core task of developing a model, specifically a foundational model for video generation.

job_tasks.phrase: conducting cutting edge research, pushing the boundaries and going beyond existing SOTA solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a focus on research and advancing the state-of-the-art in model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Reviewing specialised literature on text to video / video synthesis.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding and building upon existing research in the field of video synthesis models.

job_tasks.phrase: Designing the requirements, project scoping and owning the roadmap in your area.
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding business needs and translating them into technical plans and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Managing the progress of the Large Video Model project and making sure that it is in line with our vision.
job_tasks.justification: This task requires aligning technical project progress with the overall business vision and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Building libraries to accelerate our iteration speed during development (abstracting common functionality, automating tests sweeps, visualising results etc.).
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of software tools (libraries) to improve the software development process.

job_tasks.phrase: Developing production quality software, our teams work "full stack" with the ability to deliver direct to product and impact the world.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the development of production-quality software and a full-stack approach.

job_tasks.phrase: Taking ownership of the full ML lifecycle from concept, development, testing, validation to deployment.
job_tasks.justification: This covers the end-to-end lifecycle of an ML model, including deployment, which falls under MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Adapting off-the-shelf solutions for the purposes of our product.
job_tasks.justification: This involves modifying existing models or solutions to fit specific product needs, a form of model adaptation.

job_tasks.phrase: Optimising for deployment - turning prototypes into working solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This task focuses on the practical aspects of getting models ready for production and deployment.

soft_skills.phrase: passion for working on cutting edge problems
soft_skills.justification: Expresses a drive for innovation and tackling challenging, novel problems.

soft_skills.phrase: opportunity to collaborate with multiple research teams
soft_skills.justification: Directly indicates the need for collaboration with different teams.

soft_skills.phrase: owning the roadmap in your area.
soft_skills.justification: Demonstrates taking responsibility and ownership of a specific area's direction.

soft_skills.phrase: Taking ownership of the full ML lifecycle from concept, development, testing, validation to deployment.
soft_skills.justification: Highlights taking full responsibility for the entire lifecycle of the ML model.

soft_skills.phrase: pushing the boundaries and going beyond existing SOTA solutions.
soft_skills.justification: Implies a continuous effort to learn and adapt to achieve new advancements.

soft_skills.phrase: Adapting off-the-shelf solutions for the purposes of our product.
soft_skills.justification: This task requires problem-solving by modifying existing solutions to fit specific needs.

profile.rationale: The role involves a strong emphasis on both core software engineering tasks (building working systems, full-stack development, software lifecycle, libraries, production quality software) and specialized GenAI tasks (developing foundational video generation models, research in text-to-video, adapting solutions, understanding specific GenAI models like DALL.E, MUSE, etc.). The balance leans towards both macro-categories, with a clear focus on Generative AI, fitting the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear about the responsibilities, explicitly mentioning both software development lifecycle tasks and specific GenAI model development and research activities. The examples of technologies also clearly point to the GenAI domain. This clarity allows for a high-confidence classification.
